name: Spore
description: Runs much faster and fixes terrain issues.
notes: **CONFIGURE AND INSTALL THE DEPENDENCIES FIRST** Instructions for D9VK support: https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Installing-drivers
content:
files:
- installer: 'N/A:Select the .exe installer:'
- d9vk: https://github.com/Joshua-Ashton/d9vk/releases/download/0.13f/d9vk-0.13f.tar.gz
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/SPORE/SporebinEP1/SporeApp.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxvk-release/
    file: d9vk
- copy:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-0.13f/
    src: $CACHE/dxvk-release/
- task:
    description: Creating prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing Spore...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: d9vk-0.13f
  version: tkg-protonified-4.1-x86_64
